verses.verse: The second <S%H8145><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> even for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%> Their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
They had for their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> Beersheba <S%H884><s%> (or Sheba <S%H7652><s%>), Moladah, <S%H4137><s%>
Hazar Shual, <S%H2705><s%> Balah, <S%H1088><s%> Ezem, <S%H6107><s%>
Eltolad, <S%H513><s%> Bethul, <S%H1329><s%> Hormah, <S%H2767><s%>
Ziklag, <S%H6860><s%> Beth Marcaboth, <S%H1024><s%> Hazar Susah, <S%H2701><s%>
Beth Lebaoth, <S%H1034><s%> and Sharuhen; <S%H8287><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages; <S%H2691><s%>
Ain, <S%H5871><s%> Rimmon, <S%H7417><s%> Ether, <S%H6281><s%> and Ashan; <S%H6228><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages; <S%H2691><s%>

and all the villages <S%H2691><s%> that were around <S%H5439><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> to Baalath Beer, <S%H1192><s%> Ramah <S%H7414><s%> of the South. <S%H5045><s%> This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Out of the part <S%H2256><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon; <S%H8095><s%> for the portion <S%H2506><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was too much <S%H7227><s%> for them. <S%H1121><s%> Therefore the children of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> had inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of their inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>

The third <S%H7992><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was to Sarid. <S%H8301><s%>

Their border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> even to Maralah, <S%H4831><s%> and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Dabbesheth. <S%H1708><s%> It reached <S%H6293><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Jokneam. <S%H3362><s%>

It turned <S%H7725><s%> from Sarid <S%H8301><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%> toward the sunrise <S%H4217><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Chisloth Tabor. <S%H3696><s%> It went out <S%H3318><s%> to Daberath, <S%H1705><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> to Japhia. <S%H3309><s%>

From there it passed along <S%H5674><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> to Gath Hepher, <S%H1662><s%> to Ethkazin; <S%H6278><s%> and it went out <S%H3318><s%> at Rimmon <S%H7417><s%> which stretches to Neah. <S%H5269><s%>
The border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> around it on the north <S%H6828><s%> to Hannathon; <S%H2615><s%> and it ended <S%H8444><s%> at the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Iphtah El; <S%H3317><s%>
Kattath, <S%H7005><s%> Nahalal, <S%H5096><s%> Shimron, <S%H8110><s%> Idalah, <S%H3030><s%> and Bethlehem: <S%H1035><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
The fourth <S%H7243><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> even for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
Their border <S%H1366><s%> was to Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> Chesulloth, <S%H3694><s%> Shunem, <S%H7766><s%>
Hapharaim, <S%H2663><s%> Shion, <S%H7866><s%> Anaharath, <S%H588><s%>
Rabbith, <S%H7245><s%> Kishion, <S%H7191><s%> Ebez, <S%H77><s%>
Remeth, <S%H7432><s%> Engannim, <S%H5873><s%> En Haddah, <S%H5876><s%> and Beth Pazzez. <S%H1048><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> reached <S%H6293><s%> to Tabor, <S%H8396><s%> Shahazumah, <S%H7831><s%> and Beth Shemesh. <S%H1053><s%> Their border <S%H1366><s%> ended <S%H8444><s%> at the Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
The fifth <S%H2549><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
Their border <S%H1366><s%> was Helkath, <S%H2520><s%> Hali, <S%H2482><s%> Beten, <S%H991><s%> Achshaph, <S%H407><s%>
Allammelech, <S%H487><s%> Amad, <S%H6008><s%> Mishal. <S%H4861><s%> It reached <S%H6293><s%> to Carmel <S%H3760><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and to Shihorlibnath. <S%H7884><s%>

It turned <S%H7725><s%> toward the sunrise <S%H4217><s%> to Beth Dagon, <S%H1016><s%> and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Iphtah <S%H3317><s%> El northward <S%H6828><s%> to Beth Emek <S%H1025><s%> and Neiel. <S%H5272><s%> It went out <S%H3318><s%> to Cabul <S%H3521><s%> on the left hand, <S%H8040><s%>
and Ebron, <S%H5683><s%> Rehob, <S%H7340><s%> Hammon, <S%H2540><s%> and Kanah, <S%H7071><s%> even to great <S%H7227><s%> Sidon. <S%H6721><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> to Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> to the fortified <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> of Tyre; <S%H6865><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> to Hosah. <S%H2621><s%> It ended <S%H8444><s%> at the sea <S%H3220><s%> by the region <S%H2256><s%> of Achzib; <S%H392><s%>
Ummah <S%H5981><s%> also, <S%H663><s%> and Aphek, and Rehob: <S%H7340><s%> twenty-two <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> even for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>

Their border <S%H1366><s%> was from Heleph, <S%H2501><s%> from the oak <S%H438><s%> in Zaanannim, <S%H6815><s%> Adaminekeb, <S%H129><s%> <S%H5346><s%> and Jabneel, <S%H2995><s%> to Lakkum. <S%H3946><s%> It ended <S%H8444><s%> at the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to Aznoth Tabor, <S%H243><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> from there to Hukkok. <S%H2712><s%> It reached <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> on the south, <S%H5045><s%> and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Asher <S%H836><s%> on the west, <S%H3220><s%> and to Judah <S%H3063><s%> at the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrise. <S%H4217><s%>
The fortified <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> were Ziddim, <S%H6661><s%> Zer, <S%H6863><s%> Hammath, <S%H2575><s%> Rakkath, <S%H7557><s%> Chinnereth, <S%H3672><s%>
Adamah, <S%H128><s%> Ramah, <S%H7414><s%> Hazor, <S%H2674><s%>
Kedesh, <S%H6943><s%> Edrei, <S%H154><s%> En Hazor, <S%H5877><s%>

Iron, <S%H3375><s%> Migdal <S%H4027><s%> El, <S%H2765><s%> Horem, Beth Anath, <S%H1043><s%> and Beth Shemesh; <S%H1053><s%> nineteen <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>
The seventh <S%H7637><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%>
The border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was Zorah, <S%H6881><s%> Eshtaol, <S%H847><s%> Irshemesh, <S%H5905><s%>
Shaalabbin, <S%H8169><s%> Aijalon, <S%H357><s%> Ithlah, <S%H3494><s%>
Elon, <S%H356><s%> Timnah, <S%H8553><s%> Ekron, <S%H6138><s%>
Eltekeh, <S%H514><s%> Gibbethon, <S%H1405><s%> Baalath, <S%H1191><s%>
Jehud, <S%H3055><s%> Bene Berak, <S%H1139><s%> Gath Rimmon, <S%H1667><s%>
Me Jarkon, <S%H4313><s%> and Rakkon, <S%H7542><s%> with the border <S%H1366><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> Joppa. <S%H3305><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> beyond them; <S%H1121><s%> for the children of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Leshem, <S%H3959><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it, <S%H5221><s%> and struck it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and possessed <S%H3423><s%> it, <S%H3427><s%> and lived therein, <S%H7121><s%> and called Leshem, <S%H3959><s%> Dan, <S%H1835><s%> after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> their father. <S%H1><s%>

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

So they made an end <S%H3615><s%> of distributing the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by its borders. <S%H1367><s%> The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> in their midst. <S%H8432><s%>

According to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> him the city <S%H5892><s%> which he asked, <S%H7592><s%> even Timnathserah <S%H8556><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and he built <S%H1129><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> and lived there. <S%H3427><s%>

These are the inheritances, <S%H5159><s%> which Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> distributed for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%> So they made an end <S%H3615><s%> of dividing <S%H2505><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
